metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2319 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the Xorg-x11-server. An out-of-bounds access issue canoccur in the ProcXkbSetGeometry function due to improper validation of therequest length.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2319` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xdmx-tools - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xmir - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xnest - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xorg-server-source - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xserver-common - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xserver-xorg-xmir - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xvfb - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
xwayland - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.11
No subscription required

xorg-server-source-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.7
